text: The system shall require users to submit a selfie video with a maximum duration of 5 seconds .
to submit a selfie video with a maximum duration of 5 seconds
These videos must meet defined quality standards suitable for accurate biometric analysis and identity verification .
All submitted selfie videos

* * Liveness * *  
 All submitted selfie videos must undergo biometric liveness detection compliant with ISO / IEC 30107 - 3 standards .
To successfully verify authenticity and prevent spoofing attempts
prevent spoofing attempts
To successfully verify authenticity and prevent spoofing attempts , the detection system must achieve a spoof detection score of 0.2 or lower .
failing this threshold
Submissions failing this threshold shall be rejected automatically , prompting users to submit a new video .
prompting users to submit a new video
to submit a new video
The identity verification process shall incorporate mandatory Anti - Money Laundering ( AML ) checks , specifically cross - referencing user identities against the OFAC and EU sanctions lists .
Any positive matches during this screening will trigger immediate verification failure and initiate manual escalation to the compliance department for further review and resolution .
initiate manual escalation to the compliance department for further review and resolution
generated from user submissions
All biometric templates generated from user submissions must be securely stored utilizing AES-256 - GCM encryption .
utilizing AES-256 - GCM encryption
To maintain compliance with GDPR Article 5(1)(e ) regarding data retention limits
regarding data retention limits
To maintain compliance with GDPR Article 5(1)(e ) regarding data retention limits , stored biometric templates shall be purged from the system after a retention period of five years .
Early deletion must also be supported upon explicit user request .
